threat_description: SSRF vulnerability in image proxy allowing internal network scanning
Misconfigured Kong route exposing internal APIs to partners
Typosquatted npm package 'reqeusts' instead of 'requests' in dependencies
Secrets and API keys committed to Git history
Rate limiting bypass via header manipulation
XML External Entity (XXE) injection in partner data parser
Outdated webpack module federation with prototype pollution
Kong admin API exposed without authentication
Missing HMAC signature verification on webhooks
Vulnerable lodash version with command injection
